DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the plasma drug concentrations of three formulations of PF-05190457 after administration of single doses to healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of Three PF-05190457 Formulations In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy males and females of nonchildbearing potential between ages of 21 and 55 years, BMI of 17.5 to 30.5 kg/m^2, and weight above 50 kg. Evidence or history of clinically significant hematological, renal, endocrine, pulmonary, gastrointestinal, cardiovascular, hepatic, psychiatric, neurologic, or allergic disease.
